articles.title: Alabama family mourns pregnant nurse, unborn child dead of COVID: ‘We’re glad she’s not suffering’ - AL.com
articles.description: Haley Richardson was a healthy 32-year-old nurse with no preexisting conditions before she contracted COVID-19, loved ones said. Richardson died on Aug. 20.
articles.content:
